messages.message:
For the right users this could be useful - mind submitting a PFR for the ability to easily download files locally? We don't have plans to build a full file system in AI Hub, but this ability to download seems like a convenience for at least admins.

Some customers are (rightfully) sensitive about letting employees download raw files from AI Hub - so anything we do would likely need to be configurable.
where do we submit a pfr?
usually just through the slack plugin - I can trigger one
